author: julianfoad
msg: Fix usage of 'grep' in the build system. '$GREP' was invoked for finding
D-Bus and KWallet, but is not defined in autoconf-2.59. The build system uses
plain 'grep' or '$EGREP' everywhere else so use '$EGREP' here too.
(SVN_LIB_KWALLET): Use '$EGREP' instead of '$GREP', and adjust the regex

author: rhuijben
msg: Remove the last call to svn_wc_walk_entries3(), by making the lock
Take db and abspath. Walk children instead of entries.

author: rhuijben
msg: Replace a call to svn_wc_entry() with a svn_wc__get_entry().
(svn_wc_walk_entries3): Retrieve entry in a way that its pool can be
cleared later and only when it is not hidden. Use the standard
variable name local_abspath. Update errors to use absolute paths.

author: rhuijben
msg: Replace a few more entry operations with their db counterparts.
This time in the code that opens an access baton for an anchor
(open_anchor): Add svn_error_return() and check adm availability

author: pburba
msg: Remove some more svn_wc_adm_access_t from libsvn_client/merge.c.
(drive_merge_report_editor): Remove adm_access arg and update call to
(do_mergeinfo_unaware_dir_merge): Remove adm_access arg and update call to
(do_directory_merge): Remove adm_access arg and replace it with the
absolute WC merge target.  Update calls to
(do_merge): Remove adm_access arg and update call to
(svn_client__get_diff_editor): Take a wc_ctx instead of an adm_access
and use the former to get an adm_access for the edit baton.
